summary: This is an Argonian tail mesh replacer, with several different choices. Male can be different than female if you want.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Argonian War Tails
Author: Edhildil
12,17,2012
ver1



[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is an Argonian tail mesh replacer, with several different choices. Male can be different than female if you want. 


1) Morning Star: Adds a spiked ball and chain attached at mid-tail.
2) Scorpion:     Adds a scorpion stinger to the end of the tail.
3) Spiked:       Adds a dinosaur like spiked tail cluster to the end of the tail.
4) Thorned:      Adds crescent shaped thorns along each side of the tail.
5) Trident:      Adds a three pronged tail-end.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Its based off the vanilla Argonian male tail textures and my female Argonian texture

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27469

[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]

I didn\'t set this up for NMM to install because of the choices, I wouldn\'t use NMM.

Manual install:

In the files you will find named folders: 

Morningstar
Scorpion
Spiked
Thorned
Trident

Look at the screenshots to help choose which one to use.
Pick one male and one female tail style and copy them into the  folder named \"character assets\" in the included \"blank folder path\" folder:

blank folder path/data/meshes/actors/character/character assets

now copy the above \"data\" folder into your Skyrim folder then yes to overwrite prompt.

This will include the needed morning star texture by doing it this way. READ THIS<---

[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete these files:

femaletailargonian.nif  
maletailargonian.nif

from this folder:

data/meshes/actors/character/character assets

[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]

Some tails clip into the ground sometimes but so do the vanilla tails, so not much to say about that 

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Bethesda (original mesh)
Edhildil (War Tail meshes)

Tools:
========================
Blender
Nifskope
Gimp 2
FOMM

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

Use at will, you do not need permission from me, this is for any and all whom wish to use it, just give me proper credits if you use my work in your mod, cheers!

-E
author: Edhildil
